original: 《 據點升級 》　　當據點的 農業值、商業值、技術值 都達上限，　　可以提升據點階級，最大可以到達 5級。　　據點升級後，會有更多人口、產出更多錢糧、　　與開放更高階的附屬建物與兵種。
text: "Strategic Upgrade" 　　 When the agricultural value, commercial value, and technical value of the base all reach the upper limit, 　　 can increase the base level, up to level 5.　　After the base is upgraded, there will be more population, more money and food, 　　 and the opening of higher-level auxiliary buildings and units.
